reviews.review_msg: Education 464 may seem like a lot of work but the work is easy if you follow the instructions and put in effort. The professor will accommodate your needs.

Victoria is an amazing prof!! She responds to emails so quickly, with great feedback and it always so encouraging! If you need help and are ever feeling overwhelmed (which this class can get at times) she will never hesitate to push back deadlines and give you advice!! She marks very fairly and is overall a great prof for this class!!
